ValidationRule.description: this checks that the right quote Buyouts are selected when Renewal Status is E, or Contract Status is Active , or Status is not disposed.
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For current Status and Renewal Status the valid Quote Buyout options are: Full Residual, Payoff to Return - Entered with 1 Renewal, Net Investment with Fees, Trade-Up no Equip Return, Trade-Up to Return. Please remove any other option and try again.
